fields.summary: iOS: If you debug an app with CoreMotion module, then the app will crash on launch
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.4.0.201511241829
Appc CLI NPM: 4.2.2
Appc CLI Core: 5.1.0
Arrow: 1.3.22
SDK: 5.1.2.v20151208103647
ti.coremotion: 1.1.0
Node: v4.2.2
OS: El Capitan (10.11.1)
Xcode: 7.1.2
Device: iphone simulator (9.1)

comments.body:
[~cng], Not too sure what happened from when I filed this ticket until now, but I *cannot reproduce this issue anymore* when using the following: 

* The filed SDK (5.1.2.v20151208103647) and latest 5.1.2 SDK (5.1.2.v20151216190036)
* Xcode 7.1.1 and 7.2
* ti.coremotion 1.1.0 and 2.0.0 (latest from repo)
* iOS simulator 9.1 and 9.2
* The same filed Studio, Appc CLI NPM, Appc CLI Core, and Node version

The only delta left from when I filed this ticket is that I updated my OS from 10.11.1 to 10.11.2, but I'm not too sure if that has any effects with debugger.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
